metadata.name: Import PowerShell Modules From Suspicious Directories - ProcCreation
metadata.comment: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module "$env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module ''$env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module $env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module "$env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module ''$env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module $env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module c:\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo "$env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo ''$env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo $env:temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo "$env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo ''$env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo $env:appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo c:\\\\users\\\\public\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories
